Row.Text: [B]Rome [/B] was a precursor Civilization to [B]Great Britain[/B].
The [B]Normans[/B] were a precursor Civilization to [B]Great Britain[/B].
[B]Fleet Commanders[/B] were an important part of [B]Great Britain's[/B] identity.
“A wooden wall,” the admiral promises, gesturing at ships in drydock. The new class of naval officers have proposed a new vision of rule, one that extends not only over the land, but the waves.
